title: "Apart from Jaitely & Gadkari, No One.." I Inside Modi's Government Meetings I Top Bureaucrat Reveal
selftext: Must watch! Gives in sight on how politicians work.
comments: An insightful interview. If Arun Jaitely  had been around things would have probably been different......
Please watch this interview. His insights are really good.
Tired of insights..how to implement change?

An insightful interview. 

He talks about following things

* centralization in BJP and complete decentralization of power in UPA and also says instead we should have a middle ground. 
* Jaitley was an excellent negotiator. 
* Gadhkari and Jaitley could only say No to Lord Modi. 
* Then he talks about some unknown bureaucrats. 
* Corruption in civil servants and politicians are not real villains, it is the bureaucrats who are corrupted.
Bro ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­. I will notice it for eternity.
